main event: An unidentified flying object sighted over North Carolina in October 1962.
interesting points: The sighting involved 3 saucer-like objects that were hovering and scintillating., The analysis suggested the most probable cause could be play or spots on the negative., The sighting occurred between 1:00 and 4:00 PM along state route 10 in North Carolina., A letter from an individual in Asheville reported seeing a bright light changing colors before disappearing., The observer was considered a reliable and credible witness.
witness description: an adult male who observed a bright light in the sky
